name: Going Home (Third Rock Games)
description:
Going Home

Story

Set in the far distant future where Planet Earth is no longer able to sustain life. The Human race is leaving Earth, but they leave you behind.

Gameplay

Play as Snowman Shay and help him build a rocket to find a new home. Go through all levels collecting rockets parts and fuel for your rocket.
